properties.entry: INSERT /* com.greedy.section01.insert.Application#main() */ INTO TBL_MENU A ( A.MENU_CODE , A.MENU_NAME , A.MENU_PRICE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.ORDERABLE_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_MENU_CODE.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT A.MENU_CODE , A.MENU_NAME , A.MENU_PRICE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.ORDERABLE_STATUS FROM TBL_MENU A
